author: Diana Henry
title: Diana Henry: how to write a cookbook
text: Food and Drink Advice Diana Henry: how to write a cookbook Award-winning Telegraph food writer Diana Henry, author of nine successful recipe collections, takes us through the long and satisfying process of writing a cookbook Diana Henry loves to visit other countries and is often inspired by flavours, spices and ingredients from her travels
